title: Four Tips Before Delving into Shovel Knight Dig Today
description: Hey there shovelers! We are proud to announce that the ultimate edition of Shovel Knight Dig is finally coming to the Xbox Series X|S on May 15th! We poured our hearts into refining this ambitious game to make it the most polished version yet. So, grab your trusty shovel blade and get ready to dig [â€¦] The post Four Tips Before Delving into Shovel Knight Dig Today appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: johns
